articles.title: Stationary car's sudden acceleration just misses man and child in carpark - AsiaOne
articles.description: A man and a child walking in a carpark were nearly met with a frightening alternative had they been a split second slower. After walking in between two cars, a black car on their right accelerated unexpectedly and just missed hitting them – instead bumping ha…

articles.title: Nazir Razak 'moonlights' as e-hailing driver for a day - The Star Online
articles.description: PETALING JAYA: A few airasia Ride customers on Merdeka Day (Aug 31) were surprised by their driver that day, who turned out to be none other than prominent banker Datuk Seri Nazir Razak.
articles.content:
